divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home on I95 north saw 5 lights - 1 dissappeared then saw others hovering then they all dissappeared one at a time. Stopped along road with two other cars. Have never seen anything like this.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been no other sightings in North Attleborough
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Saw 6 lights in formation. Then each one dissappeared one at a time - no noise.
